value.title: Create Hierarchy Slicer in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can create a Hierarchy Slicer in Power BI Desktop. Microsoft recently introduced Hierarchy Slicer as a part of the OOTB slicers.  In this video, we will learn how to create a hierarchy slicer using OOTB slicer option. Also, we will check the different formatting properties

value.title: DAX Beginners - SUM Vs SUMX in Power BI - What, When and Where?
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with Dax beginner series. During this episode, we will talk about two interesting DAX expressions. SUM and SUMX. We will compare both DAX expressions in detail. First, I will explain When to use SUM and when to use SUMX. We will talk about the difference between SUM and SUMX functions

value.title: How to Display SharePoint Images to Power BI?

Most of the time we have a question in our mind that, how we can load SharePoint Document Library Images to Power BI? The procedure is very simple and straight forward. value.title: Allow users to Show and Hide columns in a Power BI Paginated report!

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions
